casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

January 14, 2011

[Cite as 01/14/2011 Case Announcements #2, 2011-Ohio-133.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2011-0065. State v. McAlmont.

Clark App. No. 09-CA-21, 2010-Ohio-5879. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal and claimed appeal of right.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for stay of the court of appeals’ judgment, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted.

Pfeifer, J., dissents and would deny the motion.
